Package org.opentcs.access.rmi

Interfaces and classes for transparently providing an openTCS kernel's functionality via RMI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KernelProxy Deprecated
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    RemoteKernel Deprecated
    Use RemoteKernelServicePortal instead.
    RemoteKernelConnection Deprecated
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientID
    Identifies a remote client unambiguously.
    DynamicRemoteKernelProxy Deprecated
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    KernelProxyBuilder Deprecated
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.
    KernelServicePortalBuilder
    Builds KernelServicePortal instances for connections to remote portals.
    TCSProxyStateEvent Deprecated
    Use ClientConnectionMode instead.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemoteKernelConnection.State
    Defines the states in which a KernelProxy instance may be in.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KernelUnavailableException Deprecated
    use ServiceUnavailableException instead.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CallPermissions Deprecated
    Call permissions are implementation-specific.

Package org.opentcs.access.rmi Description

Interfaces and classes for transparently providing an openTCS kernel's functionality via RMI.
